    • getSpikeObjectPosition

      public int getSpikeObjectPosition()
      Determine which position (1, 2, or 3) the sensor detects an object (such as a cube) is in. In this example, if neither the center or side sensors detect an object, the position is 3. If the center sensor detects an object, the position is 1. Lastly, if the side sensor detects an object, the position is 2.
      Returns:
      int positionNumber
